resources.string: Sprints represent a daily effort to do great things. Set ambitious goals and work to achieve more throughout the day.
Hint: Didn\'t quite hit the mark? Edit a Sprint to reset its due date.
Tasks represent a record of responsibilities with a set due date. Keep track of the things that need done and focus on what really matters.
Hint: Seem like too much to tackle? Split it up and make it a Goal.
